definitions.text: the part played by a person in bringing about a result
examples: I am proud of my contribution in advancing the project
they all did their share of the work

definitions.text: a voluntary gift (as of money or service or ideas) made to some worthwhile cause
act of giving in common with others for a common purpose especially to a charity

examples: he expected his contribution to be repaid with interest

definitions.text: a writing for publication especially one of a collection of writings as an article or story
